com.brightcove.player.media
Interface VideoListener

All Superinterfaces:
ErrorListener
public interface VideoListener
extends ErrorListener

VideoListener identifies objects that expect to receive a Video object from an asynchronous operation. Note: on a successful operation, onVideo() should be called, however, this interface extends ErrorListener, and if there is an error in the operation, onError() should be called.

Method Summary
 void onVideo(Video video)
          This method must be implemented to handle the Video object returned from an asynchronous operation.
 
Methods inherited from interface com.brightcove.player.media.ErrorListener
onError
 

Method Detail

onVideo

This method must be implemented to handle the Video object returned from an asynchronous operation.

Parameters:
video - The Video object provided by the asynchronous operation.
